title: Bug 102131Support extension for Aggregation functions
description: Bug 102131Support extension for Aggregation functions But nobody couldsay that can meet all the user requirements.
OB: Currently Dte provieded several buildin aggregation functions.
EB: A better solution is to provide anextension point on this area, allowing user to write their own business logicaware aggregation functions.Note BIRT Chart Engine has already defined an extension point for aggreationfunctions.
